quoteDoc: Privacy & Cookie Policy, Terms of Service
quoteText: cookies, web beacons, pixel tags, clear gifs, and other similar files or technologies may be used to collect and store the information automatically collected about your computer, device, and Service usage
title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: "When you use the Services, we automatically collect and store [...] Technical information about your computer or mobile device (such as type of device, web browser or operating system)"
